api_list.name: /gruppoiva/{piva_or_cf}

optional_parameters.name: cf
optional_parameters.description: if a tax code is given, this service will return additional information about the relationship between the VAT group and the tax code

api_list.name: /autocomplete/{query}

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: A search query; '*' can be used as a wildcard to search for strings that start, contain or end with the given query.

api_list.name: /closed/{piva_or_cf}
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cerca-imprese-advance.p.rapidapi.com/closed/12485671007"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cerca-imprese-advance.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /updates

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: is used to set the maximum number of results required

optional_parameters.name: skip
optional_parameters.description: to set the number of records you want to skip from the result set

optional_parameters.name: dry_run
optional_parameters.description: simulates a request by returning only the number of records found

api_list.name: /updates/{timestamp}

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: is used to set the maximum number of results required

optional_parameters.name: skip
optional_parameters.description: to set the number of records you want to skip from the result set

optional_parameters.name: dry_run
optional_parameters.description: simulates a request by returning only the number of records found

api_list.name: /advance

optional_parameters.name: provincia
optional_parameters.description: the code of the region you want to search in

optional_parameters.name: skip
optional_parameters.description: to set the number of records you want to skip from the result set

optional_parameters.name: denominazione
optional_parameters.description: name of the company (you can search for parts of the name as long as they are whole words)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: number of results you want to receive; if not set, the call will return a maximum of 100 results

optional_parameters.name: dry_run
optional_parameters.description: simulates a request by returning only the number of records found and the price
